extension.name: Content Island
configuration.domain.description: Domain used for Content Island API requests. Useful if you're using Content Island `On Premise`.
configuration.loginDomain.description: Domain used for Content Island login requests. Useful if you're using Content Island `On Premise`.
configuration.secureProtocol.description: Whether to use HTTPS for requests.

commands.deleteFile.title: Delete Local File
commands.pullContent.title: Pull Content from Content Island
commands.pushContent.title: Push Changes to Content Island
commands.discard.title: Discard Changes
